Text: Fuctuppunk, thanks for putting up some of the older but interesting shooters from back in the day lately. Pariah had some cool ideas and the multiplayer was a lot of fun. Unfortunately during its production, the leads at Digital Extremes bailed and the game ended up being less than it couldve been. Still worth a play through though.
np bro. you're right, this game could have been a lot better. it's pretty fun though.
